afest.datastructures.tree.decision

Class DTNode<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.BinaryTreeNode<DTNode<R,C>>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type used to identify features in points.
    C - Type of object contained in the Node.
    All Implemented Interfaces:

extends BinaryTreeNode<DTNode<R,C>>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class to represent the data contained in a decision tree node.
